mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing Nashville's Biggest Gospel Program with the Twenty First Century singers, Delois Barrett and the Barrett Sisters, The Gospel Keynotes, B. M.& E. Choir, William Brothers, Tommy Ellison and others at the War Memorial Auditorium on November 23. Poster features metal photoplates of the Twenty First Century singers, Delois Barrett and the Barrett Sisters, and the Williams Brothers. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/32569.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
